>>38210123
(( Their numbers are definitely lower. There's been an exodus of sorts, but they don't have anywhere to really go. Even if a Greater Materialization Altar was present in the lower branches with an Offering ready, it would require a player to create a Manifestation. There's almost certainly talk around town, especially among Disposable Heroes, which is sort of the Alliance's PR guild, but with the message board server destroyed, information flow is pretty screwed. ))

>>38210142
(( A lot of the mapping threads on the Averron message board compiled monster information before they went down. Some savvy Explorers, or perhaps top guild members, might have some of that information copied, but the game keeps things like drop rates nebulous. A lot of things like this could feasibly be figured out by chaining Consultations if you have enough money and enough time to spend at the fortune teller's. ))
